EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Classroom - CC-01405
EmailTemplate.subject: Affordable Modular Classroom Building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello! Looking for efficient classroom solution to accommodate a growing student population?
BOXX Modular currently has a pre-owned 7,936 sq. ft. modular classroom building available with 8 individual classrooms and 3 restrooms! This building is ready to be delivered for rent or sale to support your expanding educational needs.
View the building details --> 124' x 64' Used Modular Classroom Building https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/cc-01405/
Visit our website today to explore our complete selection of modular solutions and our team will help you find the perfect fit for your needs.
--> View used building inventory https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/
--> View modular classrooms https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/
To connect with us for more information:
--> Reply to this email
--> Request a quote on our website https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/
--> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
